assessmentItem.title: While conducting a literature review, Amira focused on the theoretical orientation of a research report from Gender & Society. Which of the following questions would be the LEAST helpful in understanding the theoretical orientation of the article?

prompt.span: While conducting a literature review, Amira focused on the theoretical orientation of a research report from Gender & Society. Which of the following questions would be the LEAST helpful in understanding the theoretical orientation of the article?

simpleChoice.span: Is the methodology used appropriate for the theoretical issues involved?
Is the author attempting to refute a paradigm or theory?
What are the names of the concepts under study?
Is a theory or hypothesis being tested?
How has the theoretical orientation shaped the methodology?
